author: Staff Reporter
text:
He knocks down a pedestrian before crashing into the median

A 19-year-old youth was killed when his motorcycle hit the median on Cathedral Road under the Anna Salai flyover on Friday.

A police official of the Pondy Bazaar Traffic Investigation wing said Daniel Sohan John Philip, a resident of Kovalam, was riding a high-end two-wheeler from Thiruvanmiyur to Kilpauk, where he was going to meet his friend.

When he approached the signal at the Cathedral Road junction under the Anna Salai flyover, he lost control of the vehicle and hit a pedestrian who was standing at the signal and then rammed the median.

Both the motorist and pedestrian sustained body and head injuries and were admitted to a private hospital. While the motorist was declared dead on arrival, the pedestrian is undergoing treatment. The victim was wearing a helmet.

The victim’s body was shifted to the Government Royapettah Hospital for post-mortem and handed over to his parents.

The youth lost control and knocked down a pedestrian before hitting the median
title: 19-year-old motorcyclist dies as he rams median
